review: I had a roku stick that constantly gave me issues and most of the time would only partially connect (therefore not work).  After a frustrating back and forth with roku, a friend recommended the fire box. I was optimistic after I compared them online but was amazed once I received and hooked it up. The picture and overall functionality are far superior to roku, my connection issues are a thing of the past and the voice remote is a really neat feature.  The HBO GO option and that it auto populates the Prime free options is very convenient.  Highly recommend this product.
